item.title: Jimmy Hendrix Rock' n Blues Tribute
item.description: 30 minutes on Jimmy Hendrix Rock'Blues Tribute on Rolling Revival. On the show: Eric Gales - Foxy Lady Paul Rodgers - Stone Free Sky High - Fire Stevie Ray Vaughan - Voodo Chile (Slight Return) Eric Burdon - I Don't Live Today (Blue Haze Songs of Jimi Hendrix) Roll On www.internationalmusicpodcast.com PLAY LOUD
item.dc:creator: Rolling Rock's
item.itunes:summary:
30 minutes on Jimmy Hendrix Rock'Blues Tribute on Rolling Revival. On the show: Eric Gales - Foxy Lady Paul Rodgers - Stone Free Sky High - Fire Stevie Ray Vaughan - Voodo Chile (Slight Return) Eric Burdon - I Don't Live Today
(Blue Haze Songs of Jimi Hendrix) Roll On www.internationalmusicpodcast.com PLAY LOUD

item.title: Stoned Music Show - Redescobrir os sons das pedras do Rock' Roll
item.description: Enjoy the music and discover the old Rock' Roll Curte este som - descoberta do velho rock Johnny Winter: Johnny B. Goode. Bill Haley: Hook, Line And Sinker. The Animals: Inside, Looking Out. Rory Gallagher: A Million Miles Away. Jethro Tull: A New Day Yesterday. Frank Zappa: Broken Hearts Are for Assholes. AC/DC: Let There Be Rock. RE-PLAY
